channel.title: Tops on Cyprus Public Opinion Trends
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Cyprus Public Opinion Trends

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to Cyprus Public Opinion Trends (C-POT)! The blog provides non-partisan information and quantitative analysis on Cypriots’ attitudes towards the social, political and cultural issues their society faces. Its objective is to make Cypriots’ views more accessible to the general public, journalists, academics and political professionals. Discussion of Greek-Cypriot and Turkish-Cypriot public opinion is a central feature of this endeavor. Quantitative analyses are based on publicly available survey data and to ensure transparency software code to replicate all analyses is provided.

item.title: contact
item.description: Please feel free to send me comments, suggestions, and ideas at: yioryos@gmail.com
